Protocols/GoogleImaIntegration.html#/s:3.name: renderingSettings
Protocols/GoogleImaIntegration.html#/s:3.abstract: The ads rendering settings which will be used when requesting an ad.

Protocols/GoogleImaIntegration.html#/s:3.name: requestAds(src:renderingSettings:)
Protocols/GoogleImaIntegration.html#/s:3.abstract: Requests a Google IMA ad with the provided adTagUrl source.

Protocols/GoogleImaIntegration.html#/s:3.name: requestAds(adsResponse:renderingSettings:)
Protocols/GoogleImaIntegration.html#/s:3.abstract: Requests a Google IMA ad with the provided adsResponse.

Protocols/GoogleImaIntegration.html#/s:3.name: dai
Protocols/GoogleImaIntegration.html#/s:3.abstract: The Google DAI API which can be used to query information about dynamically inserted advertisements.

Extensions/Ads.html#/s:13THEOplayerSDK3A.name: dai
Extensions/Ads.html#/s:13THEOplayerSDK3A.abstract: The Google DAI API which can be used to query information about dynamically inserted advertisements.

Extensions/THEOplayerConfiguration.html#.name: googleIMAConfiguration
Extensions/THEOplayerConfiguration.html#.abstract: Returns the associated GoogleIMAConfiguration to the THEOplayerConfiguration if it exists.

Classes/NativeGoogleImaAdDescription.htm.name: renderingSettings
Classes/NativeGoogleImaAdDescription.htm.abstract: The IMAAdsRenderingSettings to be used to request the Google IMA ad.

Classes/NativeGoogleImaAdDescription.htm.name: adsResponse
Classes/NativeGoogleImaAdDescription.htm.abstract: The response string returned from a GET request of an adTagUrl.

Classes/GoogleIMAConfiguration/Builder.h.name: imaSettings
Classes/GoogleIMAConfiguration/Builder.h.abstract: The Google IMA settings class that stores IMA SDK wide settings.

Classes/GoogleIMAConfiguration.html#/s:3.name: imaSettings

Classes/GoogleIMAIntegrationFactory.html.name: GoogleIMAIntegrationFactory
Classes/GoogleIMAIntegrationFactory.html.abstract: The Google IMA Integration factory which is responsible for initiating a new instance.

Classes/GoogleIMAConfiguration.html.name: GoogleIMAConfiguration
Classes/GoogleIMAConfiguration.html.abstract: A configuration type for the integration that can be passed in THEOplayerConfigurationBuilder.setGoogleIMAConfiguration. Use GoogleIMAConfiguration.Builder to initialize an instance.

Classes/GoogleImaAdErrorEvent.html.name: GoogleImaAdErrorEvent
Classes/GoogleImaAdErrorEvent.html.abstract: Extended class of AdErrorEvent that exposes additional information such as IMAAdError.

Classes/NativeGoogleImaAdDescription.htm.name: NativeGoogleImaAdDescription
Classes/NativeGoogleImaAdDescription.htm.abstract: An AdDescription object that will be added to the player when using the Google Ima ad integration.
